Uses of Package
peregrine.worker.clientd.requests

Packages that use peregrine.worker.clientd.requests
peregrine.io.chunk Code for dealing which chunks (which are fragments of partition files). 
peregrine.io.memtable Memtable implementation including arena support and record lookup. 
peregrine.io.partition Code for writing partition files which are automatically written to the correct hosts and split into chunks. 
peregrine.io.sstable Disk-based SSTable implementation supporting indexes and checksums. 
peregrine.worker.clientd Client handlers and other associated infrastructure for performing bigtable-esque GET, SCAN, and PUT operations. 
peregrine.worker.clientd.requests Code related to request handling. 
 

Classes in peregrine.worker.clientd.requests used by peregrine.io.chunk
BackendRequest
          A request for a set of keys or a scan request against the backend database from the client.
 

Classes in peregrine.worker.clientd.requests used by peregrine.io.memtable
BackendRequest
          A request for a set of keys or a scan request against the backend database from the client.
 

Classes in peregrine.worker.clientd.requests used by peregrine.io.partition
BackendRequest
          A request for a set of keys or a scan request against the backend database from the client.
 

Classes in peregrine.worker.clientd.requests used by peregrine.io.sstable
BackendRequest
          A request for a set of keys or a scan request against the backend database from the client.
ClientBackendRequest
          Represents information about a client performing a request including the netty Channel they are using, whether they are suspended, etc.
 

Classes in peregrine.worker.clientd.requests used by peregrine.worker.clientd
BackendRequest
          A request for a set of keys or a scan request against the backend database from the client.
 

Classes in peregrine.worker.clientd.requests used by peregrine.worker.clientd.requests
BackendRequest
          A request for a set of keys or a scan request against the backend database from the client.
BackendRequestFactory
          Take a request from the client and construct backend requests for the queue.
ClientBackendRequest
          Represents information about a client performing a request including the netty Channel they are using, whether they are suspended, etc.
RequestSizeable
          Used so that we can estimate the size of a request before we add an item to the queue.
